abilities.name: Synchronized Lift
abilities.effect: As long as you have Articuno ex and Zapdos ex in play, the Retreat Cost for Moltres ex is 0.

attacks.name: Flame Gift
attacks.effect: You may move a Fire Energy card attached to Moltres ex to 1 of your Pokémon.

attacks.name: Scorching Wing
attacks.effect: Discard all Fire Energy attached to Moltres ex.
